mapper.sql: emp_id, user_id, org_id, specialty, real_name, sex, phone_no, email, identity_card, nick_name, head_pic, create_user, create_time, update_time, status, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from employee
order by ${orderByClause}

select emp_id as id , nick_name as nickName, real_name as realName, head_pic as headPic, specialty as specialty from employee
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into employee (emp_id, user_id, org_id, specialty, real_name, sex, phone_no, email, identity_card, create_user, create_time, update_time, status, remark, nick_name, head_pic) values (#{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update employee
emp_id = #{record.empId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_id = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
specialty = #{record.specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{record.realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_no = #{record.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_card = #{record.identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nick_name = #{record.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_pic = #{record.headPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update employee set emp_id = #{record.empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_id = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specialty = #{record.specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{record.realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_no = #{record.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_card = #{record.identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{record.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_pic = #{record.headPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
